title: Senior Remote Sales Closer – Web Design & Tech Services - make thousands of dollars
job_overview:
Are you a PROVEN sales closer with 6+ years of real cold calling and closing under your belt? If you know how to get past “no” and turn cold prospects into paying clients, this is for you.

We run a fast-growing web design and custom tech company. Our offer is simple and converts like crazy:
 A beautiful, custom website for FREE - clients only pay $49/month for hosting, updates, and support. Small businesses love it because there’s no huge upfront cost. You’ll love it because it’s an easy close with recurring commission.

 Here’s what you get:
 $400/month base pay (USD)
 PLUS $25/month recurring commission per client you close — stacks every month!
 No limit - top closers can earn $250,000+ in year one.
 Remote.

 You MUST have:
 6+ years experience in cold calling & closing deals
 A proven track record (we will check references)
 Fluent English with ZERO accent - you must sound clear and professional to American businesses
 Strong confidence, follow-up, and hunger for big commission
 Able to do outbound prospecting daily

? Extra points if you:
• Sold websites, digital marketing, or service-based offers before
• Worked with SMBs, startups, or local business owners
• Have CRM experience and can manage your own pipeline

 Please DO NOT APPLY if:
 You have less than 6 years closing experience
 You cannot prove your past results
 Your spoken English is not 100% clear and neutral

 Ready to Earn BIG?
If you’re the real deal, apply now. Show us your numbers, your best results, and let’s make you our next top closer.

Remote. Flexible. Unlimited upside.
Your pipeline, your commissions, your freedom.
